item.title: Report E-2025020252
item.description:
Report E-2025020252

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-23T00:59:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-21
  • City: CONYERS
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG Energy, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5010
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The driver had completed his delivery and was in the process of draining residual product from the delivery hose. It appears that there was an issue with the priming function on the valve which did not allow all of the product get removed from the delivery hose. When the driver disconnected the hose, approximately 5 gallons of product was released. ERC Environmental responded to the scene and handled the remediation.

item.title: Report E-2025020255
item.description:
Report E-2025020255

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-23T00:59:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-21
  • City: ELLIJAY
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG Energy, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5675
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The KAG Energy, LLC driver overfilled the customer's storage tank. This resulted in approximately 40 gallons of diesel fuel being released. ERC Environmental responded to the scene and handled the remediation.
